subject: BET
title: Essential Accounting for Entrepreneurs
description: The purpose of this course is to introduce students to how accounting information can be used by entrepreneurs and enterprise intrapreneurs to manage an enterprise, improve decision making, and implement organizational strategy as the venture proceeds from start-up to SME to maturity.  The course is split into two parts: Financial accounting (external use of financial information) and Management Accounting (the internal use of financial information).
